SELECT DISTINCT m.* FROM sys_menu m INNER JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND m.status = 1 AND m.deleted = 0 ORDER BY m.sort_order ASC
SELECT * FROM sys_menu WHERE path = #{path} AND deleted = 0 AND status = 1 LIMIT 1
